content:
What we need to do

What we need to do

  • Collaborative authoring features in existing word processors
  • Word’s future plans
  • Directions for standards-based development

Previous slide Next slide Back to the first slide View Graphic Version

Notes:

Now I’ll talk about some directions for standards-based development of collaborative authoring features for the Web. These are really just my thoughts of the past few days, but hopefully they’re a useful starting point.
